name: Jawahar Lal Nehru
remark: The first prime minister of India and the longest-serving PM of India, the first to die in office.

name: Lal Bahadur Shastri
remark: He has given the slogan of 'Jai Jawan Jai Kisan' during the Indo-Pak war of 1965

name: Indira Gandhi
remark: First female Prime Minister of India

name: Morarji Desai
remark: Oldest to become PM (81 years old) and first to resign from office

name: Charan Singh
remark: Only PM who did not face the Parliament

name: Indira Gandhi
remark: The first lady who served as PM for the second term

name: Rajiv Gandhi
remark: Youngest to become PM (40 years old)

name: V. P. Singh
remark: First PM to step down after a vote of no confidence

name: Chandra Shekhar
remark: He belongs to  Samajwadi Janata Party

name: Atal Bihari Vajpayee
remark: The first non-congress PM who completed a full term as PM

name: Narendra Modi
remark: 4th Prime Minister of India who served two consecutive tenures

name: Narendra Modi
remark: First non-congress PM with two consecutive tenures
